<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst">AtomicRMWInst</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Parameters (see the expansion example below):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (the builder, %addr, %loaded, %new&#95;val, ordering,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///  /&#42; OUT &#42;/ %success, /&#42; OUT &#42;/ %new&#95;loaded,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %MetadataSrc)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8dde02199294f1d66e0f5979b8be3180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8dde02199294f1d66e0f5979b8be3180">CreateCmpXchgInstFun</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;void(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7">AtomicOrdering</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/syncscope/#a80741d3f96133391b683effd8e5b77f0">SyncScope::ID</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Expand an atomic RMW instruction into a loop utilizing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cmpxchg. You&#39;ll want to make sure your target machine likes cmpxchg</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions in the first place and that there isn&#39;t another, better,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// transformation available (for example AArch32/AArch64 have linked loads).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is useful in passes which can&#39;t rewrite the more exotic RMW</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions directly into a platform specific intrinsics (because, say,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// those intrinsics don&#39;t exist). If such a pass is able to expand cmpxchg</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions directly however, then, with this function, it could avoid two</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extra module passes (avoiding passes by &#96;-atomic-expand&#96; and itself). A</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// specific example would be PNaCl&#39;s &#96;RewriteAtomics&#96; pass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given: atomicrmw some&#95;op iN&#42; %addr, iN %incr ordering</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The standard expansion we produce is:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %init&#95;loaded = load atomic iN&#42; %addr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br label %loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %loaded = phi iN &#91; %init&#95;loaded, %entry &#93;, &#91; %new&#95;loaded, %loop &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %new = some&#95;op iN %loaded, %incr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ; This is what -atomic-expand will produce using this function on i686</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// targets:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %pair = cmpxchg iN&#42; %addr, iN %loaded, iN %new&#95;val</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %new&#95;loaded = extractvalue &#123; iN, i1 &#125; %pair, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %success = extractvalue &#123; iN, i1 &#125; %pair, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ; End callback produced IR</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br i1 %success, label %atomicrmw.end, label %loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// atomicrmw.end:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns true if the containing function was modified.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa59c4ae8c95bb222039942e9ba995c3e">expandAtomicRMWToCmpXchg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst">AtomicRMWInst</a> &#42;AI, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8dde02199294f1d66e0f5979b8be3180">CreateCmpXchgInstFun</a> CreateCmpXchg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;ATOMICEXPANDUTILS&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
